examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: She guessed the answer straight away.
The guard stood straight as a ramrod.
They clicked straight away.
He gives it to you straight.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
words.defineEn: in a manner that is not curved

examples: Take your pick.
His new world record will take some beating.
His apology took the edge off her anger.
Things like this take time.
The river took a meandering bend through the picturesque valley.
words.defineEn: to select or choose out of other available alternatives
words.defineVi: để chọn hoặc chọn trong số các lựa chọn thay thế có sẵn khác

examples: Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Take the second road on the right.
Swimming is second nature to Jane.
She came second in the exam.
words.defineEn: coming or happening just after the first person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra ngay sau người đầu tiên hoặc điều

examples: After months of job searching, the recent graduate was about to give up hope, but remembering that it is a long lane that has no turning encouraged her to keep trying, and eventually she landed her dream job.
The turning of the blades spins coils of wire inside a magnetic field, producing a steady supply of electricity.
The turning blades power machinery in nearby turbines to generate electricity.
And the turning radius is just way too big for like weaving in between people.
Time went on in Coketown like the turning of its machines.
words.defineEn: the part in a path that separates into two paths with different directions
words.defineVi: một phần trong một đường dẫn phân tách thành hai đường dẫn với các hướng khác nhau

examples: Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
That extension is busy right now.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
Right by holding the candle to the devil.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
words.defineEn: the direction or side that is toward the east when someone or something is facing north
words.defineVi: hướng hoặc mặt hướng về phía đông khi ai đó hoặc thứ gì đó hướng về phía bắc

examples: The car stopped at the traffic lights.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
The power outage caused the traffic lights to go haywire.
Wait for the traffic lights to change.
They have surveillance helicopters, access to drones, traffic lights with surveillance capabilities.
words.defineEn: a set of lights, often colored in red, yellow, and green, that control the traffic on a road
words.defineVi: một bộ đèn, thường có màu đỏ, vàng và xanh lục, điều khiển giao thông trên đường

examples: I need to go round to the grocery store to buy some food.
This was one of those debates which simply went round in circles.
We decided to go round the city and see what it had to offer.
It's an unavoidable truth that money and commerce make the world go round.
When the community came together to support those affected by the natural disaster, it was a reminder that love makes the world go round.
words.defineEn: to move in a circular direction

examples: They decorate the town square for holidays and special occasions.
The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
The people gathered in the town square to celebrate the victory.
If this doesn't work we're back to square one.
We'll have to go back at square one if the government pulls our funding on this project.
words.defineEn: an open area in a city or town where two or more streets meet
words.defineVi: một khu vực mở trong thành phố hoặc thị trấn nơi hai hoặc nhiều đường gặp nhau

examples: She lives on the third floor of a residential building.
That piece of work just rejected my resume for the third time!
I got the third degree when I got home last night.
A third of dog owners have experienced love at first sight when setting eyes on their dog.
The pair went toe to toe until the third set, when Azarenka squandered two match points.
words.defineEn: coming or happening right after the second person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra ngay sau người thứ hai hoặc điều

examples: We better stop at the next exit to make sure we don't run out of gas.
Frustrated with the congestion, he started elbowing through the packed hallway to reach the exit.
The flavor has exited the building.
Three Democratic candidates in three days have exited the Democratic race for president.
Bad exit, go back!
words.defineEn: a way that enables someone to get out of a room, building, or a vehicle of large capacity
words.defineVi: một cách cho phép ai đó ra khỏi phòng, tòa nhà hoặc phương tiện có công suất lớn

examples: The wind has changed direction.
Finally things are moving in the right direction.
We followed the map's directions to reach the hiking trail.
These directions are plain as a pikestaff, so you shouldn't have any questions.
These directions are as clear as a bell, so you shouldn't have any questions.
words.defineEn: the position that someone or something faces, points, or moves toward
words.defineVi: vị trí mà ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó phải đối mặt, chỉ hoặc di chuyển về phía

examples: The sunflower turned its face towards the sun.
The victory turned the tide of the war in North Africa.
The thunder had turned the milk.
Police turned water cannon on the rioters.
Turn the mould upside down.
words.defineEn: to move in a circular direction around a fixed line or point
words.defineVi: di chuyển theo hướng tròn xung quanh một đường hoặc điểm cố định

examples: I've got two left feet!
She turned the wheel sharply to the left.
I got a sudden pain in my left eye.
The left didn't know what the right was doing in this gross teen horror comedy.
On the left the ground drops away, giving a view over the rooftops.
words.defineEn: toward or located on the same side as the heart of most people
words.defineVi: hướng tới hoặc nằm cùng phía với trái tim của hầu hết mọi người
